list_definition.definition: a wooden ball rolled along the ground in playing bowls. See also bowls below.
to deliver or send (a ball) towards the batsman in cricket

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Occasionally he bowls a slow one to try and deceive the batsman.

list_definition.definition: to put (a batsman) out by hitting the wicket with the ball

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Smith was bowled for eighty-five (= Smith was put out after making eighty-five runs).

list_definition.definition: a round, deep dish eg for mixing or serving food etc
a round hollow part, especially of a tobacco pipe, a spoon etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The bowl of this spoon is dirty.

list_ex_of_english: A few other vessels, almost always additional bowls, could be placed in the same feature.
